properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/ecs/containerinsights/APIInfrastructureStack-FHIRConverterCluster3ED284AD-6lmkKWgYr3oi/performance' | fields

  CpuUtilized / CpuReserved * 100 as CpuUtilizationPercentage,

  MemoryUtilized / MemoryReserved * 100 as MemoryUtilizationPercentage

| filter Type="Task"
| stats avg(CpuUtilizationPercentage) as CpuAvgPct, avg(MemoryUtilizationPercentage) as MemAvgPct, @timestamp by TaskId, bin(1m) as When
| sort When desc, TaskId
| display CpuAvgPct, MemAvgPct, When, TaskId
properties.title: containerinsights/FHIRConverterCluster

| filter Type = "Task" | sort period desc, TaskId |  limit 10
